name: DealApp
tools: React, Redux, JSON API, Ant Design
description: DealApp is a cloud service for sales teams. Unlock the insights that help your team close more deals and ramp reps faster.

name: Fishbowl
description: Fishbowl is a social network that connects professionals within the same company and industry. The app provides industry professionals and employees a platform to directly engage and discuss topics with leadership at their company and peers throughout their industry.

name: Trybe
tools: React, Redux, Semantic UI, Node, Koa, EOSJS, GetStream, WordPress REST API
description: Trybe is a platform that collects the best articles on huge variety of themes, such as IT, travelling, health, TV and many others. Every written post gets through moderation system and will be rewarded with TRYBE cryptocurrency if it contains interesting and useful information. The Trybeâ€™s web application is a social network that built around these articles. So every participant can also create his own private posts, follow other users, talk with friends in a chat and being notified with any kind of updates in the network. According to roadmap, Trybe updates articles sharing system and extends it with EOS wallet and portfolio tracker

name: Enchilada (Maxit's internal project)
description: Tax management platform, B2B system delivering tax smart trading tools and reports to individual investors and advisors. It allows the investor to predict the tax impact of trading decisions at the tax lot level, allowing for the most tax efficient decisions while avoiding tax penalties like the wash sale rule.
